speaker: CEO
quote: FY '25, we would probably grow slower than the system. FY '26, we may be at or around the system growth rate. FY '27, we should be faster than the system growth rate.

speaker: CEO
quote: Despite intense competition and the competitive environment, deposit growth has been very healthy. On an average basis, we have grown around 15% year-on-year. Retail branch continues to contribute around 80% to 85%, in fact, to be precise, 84% of the total deposits.

speaker: CEO
quote: The margins have been stable in the range that we have been talking about at 3.45% to 3.5%. It's printed at 3.46%.

speaker: CFO
quote: The floating rate loans are roughly about 69-70% of total loans, which is similar to what we had in the previous quarter.

speaker: CEO
quote: The gross NPA continues to be stable at about 1.4%. In fact, the gross slippages at 1.2% is better than what we had witnessed same time last year.

speaker: CFO
quote: Fees at about INR8,000 crores, grew by 17% year-on-year. Third-party products, the distribution products have been quite strong. It grew by almost 32% in this quarter.

speaker: CEO
quote: We grew 240-odd branches in this quarter, 350 something for the year so far. Last year, we grew 917 branches.

speaker: CEO
quote: The LCR at 128% is above our normal operating range of 110-120%, reflecting our strategy to build liquidity cushion during this transition period.

speaker: CEO
quote: As we speak today, we are in an extremely comfortable position. Obviously, there are risks in the system... but we are well positioned looking at our portfolio and we don't have too much of a worry at this juncture.

speaker: CFO
quote: Customer credits into accounts are robustly growing in 20s, contributed by adding every quarter a little more than 2 million new customer base.
